sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/livingroom-details.css' import {Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams, useparams} from 'react-router-dom' import livingroomData from '../assets/data/livingrooms' const LivingroomDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const livingroom = livingroomData.find(livingroom=>livingroom.id===id) const {photo,title,desc,price,reviews,avgRating,color} = livingroom return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating} {" "} ( { reviews.length } )
${price}/one item Color: {color}
Description

{desc}

Reviews({reviews?.length}reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
) } export default LivingroomDetails;
